title: M&A Trends, Creating More Diverse Corporate Boards
itunes:title: M&A Trends, Creating More Diverse Corporate Boards
description:
Vito Sperduto, Co-Head of Global Mergers & Acquisitions at RBC Capital Markets, discusses M&A trends and 2020 outlook. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Managing Diversity Reporter Jeff Green talk about moving down the organizational chart to create more diverse corporate boards. Bloomberg News Finance Reporter Sridhar Natarajan shares insight on Goldman Sachs losing two prominent executives. And we Drive to the Close with Larry Pitkowsky, Co-Founder at Goodhaven Capital Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.


See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
